title: Competitive Pokemon
description: Extract and compare pokemon recommendations for Smogon singles from Reddit discussions

fields.question: What specific pokemon is being recommended or discussed?
What Smogon tier is this pokemon placed in or discussed for (OU, UU, RU, NU, Ubers, etc.)?
What competitive role does this pokemon fill (sweeper, wall, pivot, hazard setter, revenge killer, wallbreaker, etc.)?
What moves do people recommend or mention as important for this pokemon?
What EV spreads, natures, abilities, or held items do people recommend?
What makes this pokemon good? What does it beat, wall, or threaten?
What are this pokemon's common counters, checks, or competitive downsides?
What do people say about this pokemon's visual design, aesthetics, or coolness factor?
What other pokemon is this one directly compared to, and how do they differ?
